column17: For example, graphic designers or web designers might modify images several times while editing.\nIn this scenario, version control can be appropriate to help people manage the images.

column17: 2. Rollback Function: \r\nIf you encounter errors or need to go back to the previous version, \r\nversion control can easily return to a previous version without affecting the current development.

column17: 3. Branch Management: \r\nIt allows you to create branches for development, \r\nand lets different features be developed at the same time without interference.

column17: Welcome to the 'Basic Operations in Git Staging Area' stage!
column18: 歡迎來到\r\n'Git 暫存區域的基礎操作' 關卡！

column17: First, let's quickly review the knowledge and commands we learned in the previous stage.
column18: 首先，讓我們快速回顧上一關卡中學到的知識和指令

column17: In the last stage, \r\nwe used two Git commands: \r\n'git --version' and 'git init'.
column18: 在上一關卡中，\r\n我們使用了兩個 Git 指令：\r\n'git --version' 和 'git init'

column17: The 'git init' command is the basis for creating the Git management system.\nIt is the first command to execute when starting to use Git.
column18: git init' 作為創建 Git 管理系統的基礎\r\n是開始使用 Git 系統時需要輸入的第一個指令

column17: The '.git' folder, which was created by this command.\nIt is the core of the Git system.
column18: 執行指令後創建的 '.git' 資料夾\r\n是 Git 系統的核心

column17: We introduced what the '.git' folder is \r\nand mentioned the three important areas that are contained in Git:
column18: 之後介紹了 '.git' 資料夾是什麼\r\n並提到組成 Git 的三個重要區域

column17:
which is:
Working Directory
Staging Area
Repository
column18:
分別是：
'工作目錄' (Working Directory)
'暫存區域' (Staging Area)
'儲存庫' (Repository)

column17: In this stage, we will go further into the 'Staging Area'\nand control it with several Git commands.
column18: 在本次關卡中，將進一步介紹 '暫存區域'\r\n並通過幾個 Git 指令來與它互動

column17: The 'Staging Area' plays an important role in the Git system, \r\nIt acts as a bridge between the 'Working Directory' and the 'Repository'.
column18: 暫存區域' 在 Git 系統中扮演了重要的角色\r\n它作為 '工作目錄' 和 '儲存庫' 之間的橋樑

column17: After modifying files in the 'Working Directory', \r\nyou move them to the 'Staging Area' using Git commands.
column18: 在 '工作目錄' 中修改檔案內容後\r\n通過 Git 指令將檔案移動至 '暫存區域' 中

column17: Once you moved all the changes, \r\nwe'll use another Git command to store all the modifications in the 'Repository'.
column18: 在確定好修改內容後\r\n我們會通過另一個 Git 指令將所有修改內容存入 '儲存庫' 中

column17: The 'Repository' combines them into a record known as a 'commit', \r\nit means we create a new version.
column18: 儲存庫' 會把它們整合成一次記錄\r\n這個記錄稱為 '提交'，表示我們創建了一個新版本

column17: However, we can't directly see the 'Staging Area' and 'Repository' in the 'File Manager' window.\nThey need to be viewed through Git commands.
column18: 但是，我們無法直接在 '檔案管理' 視窗中\r\n看到 '暫存區域' 和 '儲存庫' 這兩個區域\r\n需要通過 Git 指令來查看它們

column17: These files are seen as 'untracked' by the Git system\nwhen the content has been '<color=#CF001C>changed</color>' but not moved to the 'Staging Area' yet.
column18: 當這些檔案在 '<color=#CF001C>變更</color>' 後\r\n但還沒有放入 '暫存區域' 時\r\nGit 系統將會視它們為 '未追蹤' 檔案

column17: Also, the plus icon is in the first line of the list.\nThis means the file 'Class_Notes.txt' is being tracked for the first time for the Git management system,
column18: 此外，列表第一行的加號圖示\r\n表示 '課堂筆記.txt' 對於 Git 管理系統來說\r\n是第一次被追蹤

column17: The 'Staged Files' area represents the files we've added to the 'Staging Area'.\nThey are ready to save as a record.

column17: After we understand the structure of the 'Staging Area', \r\nlet's try to add files to it. \r\nWe'll use the command '<color=#CF001C>git add</color>' to achieve this.
